text: @realDonaldTrump #Trump and #Pence refused to wear masks and now there are two coronavirus cases in the #WhiteHouse, including Pence's staff. You 2 are morons for spreading this virus from the top! Incompetence at its finest! https://t.co/vPpAFAqxZf
